page.title: 07SUMMER FETE IN GILMORTON
page.content: On Saturday,15th June,Gilmorton School began their fete with a parade through the village from the playing-fields to the school.Many children dressed up as story-book characters which was this year's theme.A brass band led the procession,followed by the May King and May Queen,maypole and country dancers,children in fancy dress and the rest of the villagers. The May Queen led the procession round the school playground and was crowned by an attendant.She then declared the fete open and cut a ribbon. There were many games,a cake stall,toys and books,a jumble stall,plants,white elephant stall,tombola,and a soda fountain and cream teas. There was a display of country and maypole dancing by the children.
